body_html:
Perfect @mkalininait 💚

And yes @branquinhoaa totally agree with what you're saying. I'd prefer to have #789 merged and cleaned up before introducing yet another model. The first step in this would probably be: renaming the current Attendance model to ConferencePreference. This could be done in the current PR, but it's not super necessary (I'd personally prefer a 2nd PR, since smaller ones are easier for me to review 😉 )

body:
Perfect @mkalininait 💚 

And yes @branquinhoaa totally agree with what you're saying. I'd prefer to have #789 merged and cleaned up before introducing yet another model. The first step in this would probably be: renaming the current `Attendance` model to `ConferencePreference`. This could be done in the current PR, but it's not super necessary _(I'd personally prefer a 2nd PR, since smaller ones are easier for me to review 😉 )_
